```{r}
library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(
  selectInput("dataset", label = "Dataset", choices = ls("package:datasets")),
  verbatimTextOutput("summary"),
  tableOutput("table")
)
server <- function(input, output, session) {
}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
